svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: GDP per capita (inflation- and PPP-adjusted): World Bank data vs. Penn
Real GDP at chained PPPs in 2011 US$ (Penn World Table 9.0 (2016))
Source: World Bank – WDI, Penn World Table 9.0 (2016)
